## Checklist

### Structure and Naming
- [ ] Follows repository directory structure
- [ ] Follows naming conventions (see NAMING_CONVENTIONS.md)
- [ ] Files placed in correct directories
- [ ] No duplicate files created

### Content Quality
- [ ] Content is accurate and complete
- [ ] Markdown formatting is correct
- [ ] Links are working and point to correct locations
- [ ] No spelling or grammatical errors
- [ ] Professional tone maintained

### Documentation
- [ ] README files updated with new content links
- [ ] Navigation links added where appropriate
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated with changes
- [ ] Version numbers updated if applicable

### Review
- [ ] Self-reviewed all changes
- [ ] Tested all links
- [ ] Verified file paths
- [ ] Checked for consistency with existing content
- [ ] Reviewed by program coordinator (if applicable)
